article_title: Update: Police say missing 89-year-old man has been found
article_text:
Update at 1:05 p.m.: Police say Robert Allen Hooker, an 89-year-old Garland resident, has safely returned to his home.

Original item posted at 9:57 a.m.: Garland police are seeking the public’s help in finding an 89-year-old man who has been missing since Saturday afternoon.

Police are searching for Robert Allen Hooker of Garland, who drives a silver, four-door Chevrolet Impala with Texas license plates CR1F299. He is 5-foot 10-inches tall, weighs 180 pounds and has short white hair. He is believed to be dressed in a blazer, button-down shirt and khaki slacks.

Hooker has been missing from his home in the 1900 block of Wyatt St. since late Saturday afternoon.

Police say Hooker is a health and welfare concern because he needs blood pressure medication.

Anyone with information is encouraged to call Garland police at 972-485-4840.
